patch.comment: Fix an issue where generated `.scss.js` files can contain an incorrect path to the `.css` file.
Quote classnames in .d.ts files to handle non-identifier characters.
Fix an issue where the SCSS module classifier evaluated SCSS partials instead of ignoring them (since they aren't directly importable).

minor.comment: (BREAKING CHANGE) Remove `preserveSCSSExtension`. Change input type of `cssOutputFolders` to allow specifying JavaScript shim module format. Add accessor with hook to allow other plugins to customize final CSS.
Use `tryLoadProjectConfigurationFileAsync` API to remove direct dependency on `@rushstack/heft-config-file`.
Add "suppressDeprecations" option to suppress specific SASS deprecation IDs. Add "ignoreDeprecationsInDependencies" option to ignore deprecation warnings from external SASS.

patch.comment: Include CHANGELOG.md in published releases again

minor.comment: Fix an issue where `@import` and `@use` rules that referenced dependency packages that are not direct dependencies of the project being built were not correctly resolved.
Upgrade postcss-modules from v1.5.0 to v6.0.0

patch.comment: Fix line endings in published package.
Update type-only imports to include the type modifier.

minor.comment: Switch from sass to sass-embedded for better performance.
Add "preserveSCSSExtension" flag for backwards compatibility with build flows that cannot be expected to alter import resolution.
Add `nonModuleFileExtensions` property to support generating typings for non-module CSS files.

patch.comment: Fix an issue with identifying partial sass files on Windows.

minor.comment: Fix an issue where cssOutputFolders specified in sass.json in a rig did not correctly resolve relative to the root of the project being built.
Add an option to output typings to additional output folders.
Add a "cssOuputFolders" option to "config/sass.json" to emit compiled CSS.
Update node-sass to version 6 to support Node 16.

patch.comment: Update the package.json repository field to include the directory property.
Upgrade the `@types/node` dependency to version to version 12.

minor.comment: Extract default Sass plugin to separate package
